Legend

Version:MissionOS_2.0

In the top left-hand corner above the map is the Legend functionality. (Refer to Figure 1)

The legend displays the color scheme and symbology for all the instruments and the symbolic representations of the review level status (Refer to Figure 2). The legend also allows the user to hide different instrument types using the checkboxes. If only one instrument type is required, then click the Hide button to hide all. You can uncheck the checkbox for the instrument to reappear.

 

 

  1. Click Legend to open the menu containing the following options:
  • Show Legend
  • Add instrument legend to canvas library
  1. Click Show Legend. The Legend popup appears (refer to figure below):

 

 

Note:

In the Legend popup, you can hide any instruments if required. You can also view the instrument colors associated with the AAA display states, and construction colours of vertical excavation jobs along with construction work progress. Use the Hide checkbox to hide an instrument type or Job item under construction.

  1. In the Legend menu, click Add instrument legend to canvas library to open a popup.
  2. In the popup, enter the Title name and click Add to library (refer to the figure below).
    The Instrument Legend gets added as a new element in Canvas Sheets library.
